product_name: Lezyne CNC Digital Drive Floor Pump
long_description: Equipped with a very accurate digital gauge that's easy to read, the Lezyne CNC Digital Drive pump features tip-to-tail CNC-machined aluminum for light weight and killer looks. High-polish, CNC-machined aluminum offers high durability, light weight and a sleek design. Extra-long rubber hose makes it easy to inflate tires, even if your bike is still on the stand. Flip-Thread chuck threads directly onto Presta or Schrader valves for a secure, air-tight connection. Air bleed system cleverly eliminates chance of accidentally unthreading a removable Presta valve; also lets you adjust tire pressure when inflating via Schrader valves. Included Speed Chuck makes this pump compatible with disc wheels. Lezyne CNC Digital Drive Floor Pump has a maximum inflation pressure of 220 psi (15 bars).
short_description: Equipped with a very accurate digital gauge that's easy to read, the Lezyne CNC Digital Drive pump features tip-to-tail CNC-machined aluminum for light weight and killer looks.
